name: Solitaire Kingdom
description:
Solitaire is the most beloved card game. Now you can play 3 types of card games in one app! You can play it for hours or enjoyment and relaxation.

You will love the smooth design of this wonderful card game. Get ready to enjoy some solitaire before you go to sleep.

3 Solitaire modes:
Klondike
Spider
Tripeaks
